entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[DQC.IFRS.0128.9598] The concept ifrs-full:PurchaseOfIntangibleAssetsClassifiedAsInvestingActivities with a value of 3,291,000,000 and dimensions of ifrs-full:ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwillAxis=ifrs-full:IntangibleAssetsUnderDevelopmentMember is greater than the default value for this concept of 2,820,000,000. Dimension values used with the dimension ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwillAxis should aggregate to a value no greater than the default value of 2,820,000,000. Either update the default value or the dimension value. Element : ifrs-full:PurchaseOfIntangibleAssetsClassifiedAsInvestingActivities Period : 2020-04-01 to 2021-03-31 Dimensions : ifrs-full:ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwillAxis=ifrs-full:IntangibleAssetsUnderDevelopmentMember
Rule Element Id:9598 Rule version: 17.0.0RC1 - https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1135951/000157587221000138/rdy-20210331.xml 17842

property.name: label
property.value: Purchase of intangible assets, classified as investing activities
